title: Ticket #4564: Remove references to "old-style" rescue DAGs from the manual
description: Note that this is referring to "old-style" rescue DAGs in terms of the DAG file naming, not the rescue DAGs being a complete vs. partial DAG file, which is separate. The "old-style" rescue DAG naming has been disabled for a while, but there are still references to it in the manual.
remarks:
2014-Sep-16 12:11:16 by smoler:
Please look at subsection 2.10.8.7 in the V8_2-branch of the manual, titled Single Submission of Multiple, Independent DAGs. Does this section have the old-style naming that is being removed by this ticket? Should that info be removed, or does the Rescue file naming info need to be updated?
check_ins:
2014-Sep-22 15:10   Check-in [41209]: completed: removal of old-style file naming for Rescue DAG files from the documentation #4564 (By Karen Miller )
2014-Sep-16 12:45   Check-in [41167]: doc update to remove mention of old-style Rescue DAG file naming #4564 (By Karen Miller )
creator: wenger
